msbt.message: You do remember that the fireworks light up the sky tonight, right?Look for them at 7:00 PM. Meanwhile, I'll be on the lookout for YOU, .
Don't forget, the fireworks show starts at 7:00 tonight. It is NOT to be missed, I assure you, .
Say, about the fireworks show tonight at 7:00 Will you be there?I'm looking forward to seeing the show with you. I think it's going to bea blast, .
The fireworks show will be starting sooooon!I'm so excited, I feel like my heart is booming as loud as the fireworks themselves, !
Are you all ready for tonight, my dear? The big fireworks show is about to begin! I, for one, plan to enjoy every single sparkle, twinkle, crackle, and boom, !
I'm SO glad the weather is nice tonight. We're sure to have a good view of the fireworks, .
My stars, the sky was a work of art earlier!Those fireworks It was as if someone was splashing paint across an enormous canvas! Such artistry is sure to be emblazoned in my memory for all time, .
The fireworks show was so gorgeous, I couldn't tear my eyes away! In fact, I was so enthralled, I forgot to blink for QUITE some time.Goodness, my poor eyes are STILL recovering, !
The fireworks show may be over, but I'll be basking in the glow of its memory for some time, .

Well, that was the last fireworks show of the year. It's a bit sad, isn't it, ? Then again, perhaps we wouldn't appreciate them as much if they happened ALL the time. The fact that fireworks are so fleeting must surely be part of what makes them so beautiful.
I suppose the bad news is that this year's fireworks shows have come to an end. But the good news is, we get to look forward to watching them together again next year, !
The sky won't be the same without all the fireworks. This year's festivals were truly outstanding. I can't wait to see if next year's shows will top them, !
